text: @NYGovCuomo You are making it up! Test that are positive before they are used cooking the books on deaths mandating  Covid19 patients to nursing homes killed our elderly! You that fool Murphy in Jersey & the total idiot Wolf in Pa belong in prison Your total lack of leadership is dangerous
